attributes.action: Give Students a longer Christmas holiday due to the rise of COVID-19 cases
attributes.background: Give Students a longer Christmas holiday due to the rise of COVID-19 cases As this will help reduce the spread of coronavirus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549015

If you would like Christmas holidays to be changed in a way other than requested by the above petition, you could start a new petition about this, but it would need to be clear what changes you want to be made to current school holidays.
